name: Simple (imtired)
description:
Simple is a game where you place blobs of different colours while listening to some chilled lo-fi beats, isn't that nice :). It's very simple but I'll be updating it to add some stuff. There's no end goal so you can just chill and play. Enjoy!!

Controls

Left and Right mouse button does something

Maybe press both at the same time? Interesting... (it creates green)

And R to restart

Escape to EXIT!

if you enjoyed plz rate, BYE!!

Experiment with the colours and relax, it'll be nice!! 

Music used for the game - I didn't make it but here it is :)

It's super nice.
